circumstances: Sole on board, the pilot was completing an on-demand cargo flight. While flying along the Feast Florida coast, both engines failed simultaneously. The pilot contacted ATC, reported his position and elected to make an emergency landing but was eventually forced to ditch the aircraft off Miami. While the pilot was evacuated safely, the airplane sank and was not recovered.
probable_cause: Double engine failure in flight for undetermined reason. The exact cause of the accident could not be determined as the aircraft was not recovered.
